DOC.brief_summary: The purpose randomize prospective clinical trial determine whether infertility treatment move quickly In Vitro Fertilization ( IVF ) cost effective usual treatment strategy include various combination infertility drug intrauterine insemination ( IUI ) prior utilize In Vitro Fertilization .
DOC.brief_title: Conventional Infertility Treatment vs. Fast Track IVF
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize clinical trial evaluate efficacy , adverse event , particularly cost cost-effectiveness two alternative infertility treatment strategy patient would otherwise candidate ovulation induction IUI initial treatment . The two therapy compare conventional treatment fast track IVF . Conventional therapy cost-conscious progressive treatment strategy begin least invasive form ovulation induction , clomiphene/IUI . It progress FSH/IUI , pregnancy achieve , IVF . The fast track IVF strategy begin clomiphene/IUI ; pregnancy result , patient bypass FSH/IUI move directly IVF . We hypothesize fast track IVF therapy result higher pregnancy rate , low rate medical complication treatment , low rate pregnancy complication , cost conventional infertility treatment . The trial follow specific aim : Aim 1 : To compare number delivery per initiated cycle , proportion woman clinically recognize intrauterine pregnancy , time clinical pregnancy fast track IVF conventional treatment arm clinical trial . Aim 2 : To compare frequency infertility treatment complication fast track IVF arm conventional treatment arm . Aim 3 : To compare occurrence pregnancy complication fast track IVF arm conventional treatment arm . Aim 4 : To evaluate cost cost effectiveness two alternative treatment strategy compare direct indirect medical cost fast track IVF conventional treatment arm clinical trial . This collaborative study Boston IVF , Harvard Vanguard Medical Associates , Harvard School Public Health , Blue Cross Blue Shield Massachusetts , Harvard Pilgrim Health Care , Tufts Health Plan . Total Enrollment : 503 Couples
DOC.criteria: Female partner age 21 40th birthday , time recruitment . Infertility define failure conceive recognize pregnancy one year ( 12 menstrual cycle ) unprotected intercourse . Male partner normal semen analysis sperm concentration > 15 million total motile sperm , > 1 % normal form strict criterion , > 5 million total motile sperm IUI prep . Female patient least one ovary least one ipsilateral patent fallopian tube confirm HSG laparoscopy ; pelvic pathology amenable operative laparoscopy ( pelvis restore functional ) . The open tube previous ectopic ( tubal ) pregnancy close tube hydrosalpinx ( tube block end fill fluid ) , unless tubal ligation perform junction uterus fallopian tube . Patients surgically correct stage I II endometriosis include . Normal uterine cavity demonstrate HSG , Sonohysterogram ( SHG ) , hysteroscopy ; pathology uterine cavity amenable operative hysteroscopy ( cavity restore normal demonstrate post operative study ) . Anovulatory patient conceive minimum three ovulatory cycle medication , include gonadotropin therapy . Anovulatory patient unable achieve ovulation dosages 150 mg clomiphene standard dosage ovulation induce medication ( i.e . bromocriptine ) . Hypoestrogenic hypothalamic amenorrhea patient qualify immediately inclusion , prior gonadotropin therapy . Normal ovarian reserve demonstrate patient i.e. , cycle day 3 FSH/E2 value < 15 mIU/mL < 100 pg/mL , respectively . Normal TSH prolactin . Female body mass index â‰¤ 38 . Previous tubal reconstructive surgery pelvis restore functional . Unilateral bilateral hydrosalpinx ( tube block end fill fluid ) tubal ligation perform junction uterus fallopian tube . A laparoscopy demonstrate pelvic adhesion endometriosis pelvis could restore normal surgery endometriosis ablate excise . All patient stage III IV endometriosis . One prior ectopic pregnancy one tube render nonfunctional ; two ectopic pregnancy , even tubes patent . Severe male factor ( i.e . ; semen analysis sperm concentration < 15 million total motile sperm , < 1 % normal form strict criterion , < 5 million total motile sperm IUI prep ) . Couples use donor semen exclude . Previous treatment IUI IVF . Previous treatment normal ovulation patient gonadotropin . Inadequate ovarian reserve demonstrate FSH > 15 mIU/mL estradiol > 100 pg/mL . Patients require gamete intrafallopian tube transfer ( GIFT ) , zygote intrafallopian tube transfer ( ZIFT ) , tubal embryo transfer ( TET ) . Female body mass index > 38 .
